Musicians would become extremely influential and essential on society as they would be the primary vessel of information, values and beliefs.
Art forms, storytelling and poetry would become obsolete, as music would cover all the gaps left behind.
The internet revolution would look very different, as it would primarily revolve around streaming and sharing music with others.
Music festivals would become the center of cultural exchange and socialization, rather than just entertainment.
People would need to find new ways to express their identities and emotions in songs and music pieces.
